Source.Name: kdevelop-pg-qt
Source.Summary: Parser generator written in readable source-code
Source.Description: KDevelop-PG-Qt is a parser generator written in readable source-code and generating readable source-code. Its syntax was inspirated by AntLR. It implements the visitor-pattern and uses the Qt library.
